message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more!
I'll give you a bit more, but not too much!
I'll take most of it, you can have a little!
Let's meet in the middle, but I'll give you a bit more!
You're getting desperate, take what you can get!
Let's go back to the original 50/50 split, it's a fair deal!
